title: The Littlest Elf
description: It’s springtime in the forest, the chipmunks are singing, and the littlest elf starts the day.
parent: Lemony Snicket’s A Series of Unfortunate Events
alt1: a storybook-like village of tree homes
alt3: happy animal friends with an elf holding a rifle
alt4: the littlest elf with a butterfly on their nose
